doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 29
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 29
1. Footage from CSPAN of US House of Representatives voting on a bill to define marriage and allow states not to recognize same-sex marriages.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."

2. "Lambda Update": Kevin Cathcart, Executive Director of the Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Lou Maletta's interview with Catherine Hanssens, Lambda AIDS Project Director, regarding the 11th international AIDS conference held in Vancouver.
COMMERCIAL: "Support Human Rights for Lesbian and Gay People", sponsored by Professionals in Film/Video. Includes Cathay Che of GLAAD.
3. Lou Maletta interviews David Tuller, author, regarding his book "Cracks in the Iron Closet: Travels in Gay and Lesbian Russia".

4. Footage of "Mad Elephants â€“ The 1992 Republican National Convention". Includes footage of various unnamed Republican Delegates; Phil Gramm, Senator; Phyllis Schlafly, Republican Delegate; Robert Dornan, Congressman; and Strom Thurmond, Senator.

5. Footage of ACTUP March to the Houston Astrodome and additional footage of [Mad Elephants - 1992 Republican National Convention]. Includes footage of various unnamed Republican Delegates; Mary Fisher, HIV-positive Keynote Speaker; Steven Bradley, HIV-positive reporter; Patrick Buchanan, politician; Rev. Lou Sheldon, of the Traditional Values Coalition; Rev. Pat Robertson, Christian Broadcasting; Newt Gingrich, Congressman; Guy Hunt, Alabama Governor; and Beth Leibo, GCN Correspondent.
